author: Daniel Greene
description:
After years of building momentum, The Wheel of Time has officially been canceled at Amazon Prime Video. In this episode, I break down what led to the decision, what we know about the behind-the-scenes factors, and what this means for the future of the franchise—and the streaming fantasy landscape overall.

Is this the end for The Wheel of Time on screen? Or could another studio pick it up? Let’s talk about the legacy, the loss, and what fans should (and shouldn’t) expect next.
